::Shadow Wing::

She decided that letting him go free must be what is best for him 
right now.  
She saw that even though she had a lot to learn, so did he.  He would 
have to learn to make peace with himself in order to continue on.  
She thought that if they were ever to have a chance, he would have to 
fight his own demons that plagued him.  This was one fight that she 
couldn't help him with.  She shook her head and flew off.  She soared 
over the hills and looked about.

She came upon a clearing.  She perched and looked down.  She saw two 
bots standing next to each other.  One was standing while the other 
was sitting.  One was holding some type of device with wires coming 
out of it and attaching to the other bot's head.  She used her 
telescopic vision to look at the symbols. Predacons!  

She decided to just keep an eye on things.  She stayed perched high 
up in the tree and observed what was going on.
